markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Camouflage Dye](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1937)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 52 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Camouflage dye uses a variety of alchemically treated paints and crushed crystals to make the user particularly hard to distinguish from their surroundings. When you Activate the dye by sprinkling it on yourself or a creature within reach, the target and its clothing change colors, blending into their surroundings until the target makes a sudden movement. The target can [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62) or [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) without [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) or [concealment](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) for 10 minutes. If the target uses a [hostile action](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) or moves at more than half its Speed, after that action is completed, the effects of camouflage powder end and the creature ceases to be [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Camouflage Dye (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 52 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Camouflage Dye (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 52 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The dye lasts 1 minute, and the effects don't end if the target uses a hostile action or moves at more than half its Speed.
name: Camouflage Dye (Lesser)
